tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
About a year back my molar tooth implant failed and had to be removed. Further I was informed that a new implant could not be fitted as my jaw bone had shrunk and did not have the necessary width / height for placing the implant. I was therefore advised to undergo a bone augmentation surgery first and wait for about 6 to 12 months for placement of implant and further wait for 4 to 6 months for fitting of the tooth crown. Considering the  trauma of undergoing a bone augmentation surgery of as well as the cost and time aspects, I was not keen on this option.

In the meantime another root canal treated molar on the opposite side fractured  and I started having difficulty in eating normally as I could not chew properly on either side of my mouth. When I started searching the net in desperation for alternate solutions for my predicament, I came across some research articles on cortical bone implants used in orthopedics and their application in modern dentistry in the form of 'Basal Cortical Screw' or BCS dental implants that are placed deep in the cortical or dense bone. Since the cortical bone is available even in relatively atrophied jaws, it provides a viable alternative to the traditional bone augmentation route. 

Encouraged with this information, I then started searching for dentists in Mumbai offering the Basal type implants and was fortunate to come upon Dr Rohan Virani's clinic - Trissa Dental Solutions located in Mulund, Mumbai. I immediately requested for an appointment with Dr. Rohan Virani. On studying my case and examining the X Rays, he assured me that the Swiss BCS Cortical Implants can be placed in my jaw directly without any bone augmentation surgery. I was greatly relieved to hear this and agreed to undergo the implant procedure. I did not experience any pain or discomfort during the treatment and got my teeth crowns in about three days after placement of the implant! There were no stitches to heal, no waiting time for implant to be integrated into the gums and no extra expenses for bone augmentation surgery! 

Thanks to Dr Rohan Virani and his team of doctors, I am able to eat normally today. I have no hesitation whatsoever in recommending Dr Rohan Virani for any person suffering from dental problems as above.

S.Shreeram
reply_text:
thnk  you  for ur  elaborate  and honest feedback. it was a pleasure to have you with us.
we are committed  to use the best available  and latest technologies to help our  patients.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Before flying to India my only worry was visiting a dentist. I knew for sure that my wisdom tooth had to be extracted and one tooth might need a root canal. Wisdom tooth extraction, I had heard my friends and relatives  saying that half wisdom tooth was extracted and other half didnt and root canal is very painful, so started to search on Google "painless root canal in Mumbai" & came across Trisa Dental Clinic. Was not sure if it's true untill I visited n underwent the treatment. Root canal treatment was painless and wisdom tooth extraction was perfect. Before the treatment Dr. Rohan had explained about the condition of my tooth and the treatment for same. Clinic is very clean and hygenic. Thanks to Dr. Rohan and his team. Now I can enjoy eating all my favorite food in Mumbai before flying back. And now am not scared of dentist

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ***** ****** * * ******** **** *** ****** *** *** ************** ******** . A great teacher for his fraternity by teaching thru the book " Basal Implantology Simplified : 5x Your Implant Practice"and the  in person. Inshort a very impressive personality. 

The treatment was flawless , systematic and brisk.

Dr. Bhavana Premchandran , with her gentle hands and her caring nature is an outstanding asset to Trisha Dental Dental Solutions. 

Would recommend, without a second thought, to get the treatment under the supervision of Dr. Rohan Virani . 

The staff at the dental clinic is full of positivity and a nature to co operate and answer our questions literally at any time. ( Thank you Dimple for your reciprocals) 

True to its name , as a whole , they are a solution to the dental problems.

I thank you all , wholeheartedly , for the comfortable journey I went thru without any hassles.

A seven stars as 5 star is too low for you guys.
reply_text: Thank you for amazing feedback . We are glad we could give you a pain-free amazing expierence

review:
I am from  Nairobi  Kenya . A few years ago I read about Dr Rohan and decided to come and see him for some dental work and my wife and I were very impressed with his treatment. From that day we all our dental treatment is done by him.
During the covid  lock down we could not leave Kenya and had to bear with the dental pain.
We tried our local dentists but were not happy at all. We came here as soon as the Kenya opened up 
WE are very happy with his treatment and have recommended him to all our friends.

review:
Mr Rohan Virano is well Experienced Doctor and has handled the whole treatment with ease.  I didn't face any problems or difficulties. the treatment went of very smooth. 
As regards cost Implant under swiss methodology is a bit expensive than the normal placing of implants. In the normal route, the waiting period is between 3-4 months and under Swiss Methodology, it is 8 to 10 days and u get the whole exercise done. Both the methodology has their own advantages/disadvantages. 
I am happy with the treatment provided to me By Dr Rohan Virani.

review:
I have been going to Trisa Dental Solution for a while now and always had been well taken care of my dental problems. It's clearly evident of how well they serve their patients and there concerns even in the times of Covid 19 lockdown situation. They took utmost precautions of asking to install and share the results of Arogya setu app before finalizing the appointment, wearing PPE kits for themselves & patients, but also make sure to attend one patient  at a time and cleaning the clinic well before & after treating each one of them. 

Thanks Team Trisa for always being a thoroughly professional and still friendly, you guys are doing a fab job.

reply_text:
we apologise for inconveinence caused if any . mostly all our root canals are done in single sitting with 1 single painless injection and we do not unnecessarily keep injecting patients -  your story  of putting 7 injections is obviously fabricated and in bad taste to malalign us for reasons best known to you. we charge inr 4500/- (which you mention as sky rocket) for a root canal & assure best quality services. this was communicated to you before start of work & agreed by you (you willingly sat on the dental chair for 2 hours to get the prcedure done  ).
we have your cctv footages of you sitting relaxed throughout  the dental procedure. after the work you  started  creating a ruckus during payment .
it is obvious you didnt have the money to pay and hence you wish to create such issues so we go soft on you.
we have all your pre operative xrays, cctv footages and your signed consent taken before start of treatment

we invite you to clinic to solve this matter amicably rather than posting wrong things on social media platform

also we request you to pay your balance dues at earliest.
